name: JunkRuners
description:
Junk Runners is first person parkour speed run game.  Your goal is to find and reach the exit of the map as quickly as possible.

In future updates I plan on developing the graphics and theming of the game. Set in a dystopian city hidden away underground in the wasteland. You are equipped with a home made propulsion suit allowing you to scale buildings and move at great speed.

I also plan on adding more levels and new mechanics.
